name: rebar grate
description: Interlocked sections of rebar that allows for light and effective reinforcement of vehicle sections.

name: shock absorber
description: This makeshift combination of springs and scrap, when attached to a vehicle section, protects that section from impacts.  The springs can absorb a surprising amount of damage.

name: wooden armor kit
description: A bundle of two by fours prepared to be used as vehicle armor.

name: reinforced wooden armor kit
description: A large bundle of two by fours prepared to be used as vehicle armor.

name: wooden slab armor kit
description: A huge slab of two by fours prepared to be used as vehicle armor.

name: reinforced wooden slab armor kit
description: A huge, thick slab of two by fours prepared to be used as vehicle armor.

name: heavy wooden slab armor kit
description: An immensely huge bundle of two by fours prepared to be used as vehicle armor.

name: steel plating
description: A sheet of armor plating made of steel.

name: reinforced steel plating
description: A thick sheet of armor plating made of steel.

name: steel slab plating
description: A slab of armor plating made of steel.

name: reinforced steel slab plating
description: A large slab of armor plating made of steel.

name: heavy steel slab plating
description: An immense slab of armor plating made of steel.

name: superalloy plating
description: A sheet of armor plating made of sturdy superalloy.

name: reinforced superalloy plating
description: A thick sheet of armor plating made of sturdy superalloy.

name: superalloy slab plating
description: A slab of armor plating made of sturdy superalloy.

name: reinforced superalloy slab plating
description: A large slab of armor plating made of sturdy superalloy.

name: heavy superalloy slab plating
description: An immense slab of armor plating made of sturdy superalloy.

name: superalloy sheet
description: A sheet of sturdy superalloy, incredibly hard, yet incredibly malleable.

name: spiked plating
description: A piece of armor plating made of steel.  It is covered with menacing spikes.

name: hard plating
description: A sheet of armor plating made of hardened steel.

name: reinforced hard plating
description: A thick sheet of armor plating made of hardened steel.

name: hard slab plating
description: A slab of armor plating made of hardened steel.

name: reinforced hard slab plating
description: A large slab of armor plating made of hardened steel.

name: heavy hard slab plating
description: An immense slab of armor plating made of hardened steel.

name: military composite plating
description: A sheet of military grade armor.

name: reinforced military composite plating
description: A thick sheet of military grade armor.

name: military composite slab plating
description: A slab of military grade armor.

name: reinforced military composite slab plating
description: A large slab of military grade armor.

name: heavy military composite slab plating
description: An immense slab of military grade armor.

name: chitin armor kit
description: Light chitin plating made for a vehicle.

name: biosilicified chitin armor kit
description: Durable silica-coated chitin plating made for a vehicle.

name: bone armor kit
description: Bone plating made for a vehicle.
